entry.title: Holiday Hell
entry.summary:
Author: ieatassforbreakfast009

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,358Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 27

Summary: All Stiles wanted was to give the Hale Pack a normal holiday season—tree decorating, sugar cookies, and zero supernatural explosions. Unfortunately, the wolves are competitive about everything, Derek is allergic to fun, and Stiles’ spark might actually explode from holiday stress. Still, if it means giving the pack a family again, Stiles is willing to drag them through holiday hell… one disaster at a time.

entry.title: Dead Ends and New Beginnings
entry.summary:
Author: Buttercupcheese

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,470Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 145

Summary: Stiles groaned and slowly got up. Isaac had fallen asleep somewhere between Peter’s rant about trolls' healing properties and Derek's hypothesis of witches, which — for the first time— well, not first, but Stiles wanted to exaggerate — Stiles thought the same.“Look, I'm running on just, like, three full hours of sleep. I haven't had a single drop of caffeine in my system, and my waffles are getting cold,” he said, heading to reheat his coffee.“You shouldn't drink caffeine, Stiles,” his dad said, concern and disapproval firmly set on his features.“And there shouldn’t be walking corpses out there, Dad, but hey—life’s unfair.”

entry.title: Echoes of a Shattered Winter
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,740Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it’s impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.

entry.title: I Thought Duty Called But It Was Just My Past
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,394Chapters: 10/19Kudos: 140

Summary: Stiles got shot because of his own reckless behavior and his superiors decide he should take some leave. What better way to celebrate his survival than going back to the place that managed to kill him twice?When he gets back to Beacon Hills, he finds it’s changed a bit. Scott working as a paramedic, a whole hospital team that knows about werewolves, and a supernaturally good high school Lacrosse team.Between the possibility or a new pack in town, a rumor about Stiles’s connection to a suspiciously familiar looking teen and all the pain meds he’s taking to make it through the day, what’s a guy to do first?

entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,339Chapters: 19/29Kudos: 211

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.title: The Delta Pair and the Newly Awakened Universe
entry.summary:
Author: Mewwy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,069Chapters: 12/18Kudos: 11

Summary: When the world was introduced to the Supernatural, Sentinels and Guides over a hundred years ago, something remained hidden. Or should I say someone? It has taken two generations for the world tribe to come to terms that mundane human beings are not the only ones on the planet. There are the enhanced, Sentinels and Guides, and the Supernatural. But can there be more? Is there something more?There is a myth that has been foretold by those Guides on the spirit plane, but records offer only tantalizing fragments. Is this legendary prophecy real? And what role do Derek Sebastian Hale and Mieczysław Gajos “Mischief” “Stiles” Stilinski play into its unfolding? If the myth proves true, how far will their families go to shield them from its consequences?

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,751Chapters: 6/15Kudos: 87

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: So Pick Me, Choose Me, Top Me
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,666Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 189

Summary: Stiles just wanted one thing: a quiet night, some alone time, and DomTop69 to take care of his chronic case of blue balls. What he got instead was murder, missing organs, and Derek Hale crashing through his hookup like an overprotective sourwolf-shaped wrecking ball. Now there are dead bodies piling up in Beacon Hills, Stiles’ crush is way too obvious to every werewolf in a five-mile radius, and apparently? Derek may have considered snapping his hot Grindr date's neck with his werewolf claws. It’s messy, it’s dangerous, it’s infuriating, and Stiles can’t stop himself from diving headfirst into the chaos. Typical. A casefic full of supernatural mystery, sarcastic banter, Grindr disasters, Derek’s terrible timing, Stiles Stilinski’s very inconvenient feelings, and blue balls so blue Stiles might star as the Blues Clues' new host.

entry.title: Crown of Forget-Me-Not's
entry.summary:
Author: CozyEarth

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,854Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Grief is a funny thing.It hits everyone differently and presents itself in many different forms.They say that there are five stages of grief, but for Stiles, they all ended with him crying.Stiles always hated the crying.Sorrowful tears that would make him spiral into despair. Hatefully angry tears that burned his eyes and fueled his sharp tongue. Happy tears that washed over a wave of melancholy.Stiles hated it every single time.Because when Stiles cried, it was all consuming. -Losing a parent hurts.Even when it's years later.Even when the world gets turned on its head, the supernatural is real, and your best friend leaves you to the wolves for a girl.Literally!Stiles knows he has a lot to work through, but everything keeps piling up.What will be the breaking point?And will he allow himself to ask for help?
